artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Dark to light blue & green warp. Light green & tan weft. Plain weave variation.  Stapled to a glossy, Larsen, 6.5x7" card.  "H-8B" written on top.  "#2" under textile. (blue, green, tan)
title: Lapis Development Sample
